name: Cracked Crab Cabal
description:
Defend your sand castles from a crab cabal in this relaxing game!

The crabs move along a beach shaped like your keyboard. Aim shells to hit the crabs by pressing the corresponding key on your keyboard, and don't let them reach your sand castle! Everything falls in one hit, including the crabs but also your castle.

- Test your skills in 20 custom waves as well as an endless mode afterward!

- Different crab types- in order of least to most speed; red, green, blue, grey

Good luck!

Made in 72 hours for Mini Jam #108: Seaside

Music credit: Seaside by Sakura Girl
